channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: browserbase /stagehand
item.description: An AI web browsing framework focused on simplicity and extensibility.

item.title: cline /cline
item.description: Autonomous coding agent right in your IDE, capable of creating/editing files, executing commands, using the browser, and more with your permission every step of the way.

item.title: codecrafters-io /build-your-own-x
item.description: Master programming by recreating your favorite technologies from scratch.

item.title: SimplifyJobs /New-Grad-Positions
item.description: A collection of full time roles in SWE, Quant, and PM for new grads.

item.title: midday-ai /midday
item.description: Invoicing, Time tracking, File reconciliation, Storage, Financial Overview & your own Assistant made for Freelancers

item.title: docmost /docmost
item.description: Docmost is an open-source collaborative wiki and documentation software. It is an open-source alternative to Confluence and Notion.

item.title: svcvit /Awesome-Dify-Workflow
item.description: 分享一些好用的 Dify DSL 工作流程，自用、学习两相宜。 Sharing some Dify workflows.

item.title: vanna-ai /vanna
item.description: 🤖 Chat with your SQL database 📊. Accurate Text-to-SQL Generation via LLMs using RAG 🔄.

item.title: NirDiamant /RAG_Techniques
item.description: This repository showcases various advanced techniques for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. RAG systems combine information retrieval with generative models to provide accurate and contextually rich responses.

item.title: Anduin2017 /HowToCook
item.description: 程序员在家做饭方法指南。Programmer's guide about how to cook at home (Simplified Chinese only).

item.title: CVEProject /cvelistV5
item.description: CVE cache of the official CVE List in CVE JSON 5 format
